alert.note: Alert for Grant; La Salle; Natchitoches (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 3:37PM CDT until August 17 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central La Salle Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 337 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Walters to 10 miles northwest of Flatwoods, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jena, Colfax, Midway, Pollock, Dry Prong, Nebo, Cloutierville, Rogers, Catahoula Lake, Bellwood, Chopin, Bentley, Lake Iatt, Aloha, Fishville, Williana and Gorum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
